page.title: 10Eaton Village,Congleton
page.content: {Eaton}is a small village situated on a busy road two miles north of {Congleton. }It has a population of 257. {Eaton's}buildings include modern bungalows, semi-detatched council houses and older dwellings. There are no shops in{Eaton}so villagers shop in nearby{Congleton}or Macclesfield. To cater for those who do not posess a car there is a bus service operating on an hourly basis. {Eaton}has few amenities. There is a public house which is over 300 years old. The only industry in the village is a blacksmiths forge, the craftsmen works within a 30 mile radius. People have to work in nearby towns. Eaton has a church that was built in the 19th Century and the village is very different from{Congleton.
